SEARCH

Class Server

java.lang.Object
Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable
Threaded server class that stores server details and client information. Server is responsible for dispatching threads to manage clients messages.
Version:
11 /1/2023 Fall/2023
Author:
Zachary Cowan

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(int numClients)
      Instantiates a new Server
      Parameters:
      numClients - Max Number of clients to allow.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Execution loop for Server where: clients connection request are accepted, a message handler is delegated for a connected client, and the socket list is managed.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getServerName

      public static String getServerName()
      Gets server name. As part of design, server name is only read if server critical is closed.
      Returns:
      The current server name.

    • isServerNameCriticalOpen

      public static boolean isServerNameCriticalOpen()
      Get the state of the server name critical section
      Returns:
      Returns true Server Name critical section is open. False otherwise.

    • openServerNameCritical

      public static void openServerNameCritical()
      Open server name critical section for editing.

    • closeServerNameCritical

      public static void closeServerNameCritical()
      Close server name critical section when editing complete.

    • setServerName

      public static void setServerName(String newName)
      Sets server name.
      Parameters:
      newName - The new server name.

    • getServerWelcomeMessage

      public static String getServerWelcomeMessage()
      Gets server welcome message.
      Returns:
      the server welcome message

    • getSocketList

      public static ArrayList<Socket> getSocketList()
      Gets socket list.
      Returns:
      The current socket list.

    • getClientHandlerList

      public static ArrayList<ClientMessageHandler> getClientHandlerList()
      Gets client handler list.
      Returns:
      The current client handler list.

    • addToEditServerQueue

      public static void addToEditServerQueue(Socket client)
      Add to client to edit server request queue.
      Parameters:
      client - Edit requesting client socket.

    • removeFromEditServerQueue

      public static void removeFromEditServerQueue(Socket client)
      Remove client from edit server request queue.
      Parameters:
      client - The client socket requesting to end request.

    • isNextToEdit

      public static boolean isNextToEdit(Socket socket)
      Determine if a socket is next in the edit request queue.
      Parameters:
      socket - The client socket to check.
      Returns:
      true if client socket is next up in queue. false, otherwise.
